EmailTemplate.name: BAP IP Benef
EmailTemplate.subject: BAP IP Benef
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email.
The LegalZoom Business Advantage Pro IP is a membership that gives you access to the following benefits:
- Attorney advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced attorney on an unlimited number of new legal matters - Attorney drafted letters. Your attorney can draft legal letters or on your behalf - Unlimited access to LegalZoom legal forms. Download hundreds of blank legal forms for business or personal use - 25% savings on additional attorney services. Get significant savings on additional attorney work if you need it - File a copyright each month for just the cost of the federal filing fee. - 10% savings on any LegalZoom legal documents. Get any LegalZoom business or personal documents
After your 30-day trial, your Business Advantage Pro membership will renew automatically at $__.__ annually/semiannually.
If you are not completely satisfied with your membership, you can cancel it at any time.
{!snippetVariable.asdsigline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.attt} {!snippetVariable.asdphone2} {!snippetVariable.asdhours}.
{!snippetVariable.bestregardstext}
{!snippetVariable.thelegalzoomteamline}
{!snippetVariable.asdphone} | {!snippetVariable.asdfax} | {!snippetVariable.lacemail} {!snippetVariable.lz_website} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
